trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse" /> class is sent by the server as a response to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse" /> viene inviata dal server come risposta a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: This response contains zero or more <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultEntry" /> objects, and zero or more <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultReference" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Questa risposta contiene zero o più oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultEntry" /> e zero o più oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultReference" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.Controls" /> property contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl" /> object returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.Controls" /> contiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl" /> restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl" /> object returned by the server.

The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.Entries" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultEntryCollection" /> object that contains the entries returned by the search.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.Entries" /> contiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultEntryCollection" /> che contiene le voci restituite dalla ricerca.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultEntryCollection" /> object that contains the entries returned by the search.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultEntryCollection" /> che contiene le voci restituite dalla ricerca.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.ErrorMessage" /> property contains the error message, if any, for this operation.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.ErrorMessage" /> contiene l'eventuale messaggio di errore per l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The error message, if any, for this operation.
trans-unit.target: Eventuale messaggio di errore per l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.MatchedDN" /> property contains the matched distinguished name returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.MatchedDN" /> contiene il nome distinto corrispondente restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The matched distinguished name returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: Nome distinto corrispondente restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.References" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultReferenceCollection" /> object that contains search references returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.References" /> contiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultReferenceCollection" /> che contiene i riferimenti di ricerca restituiti dal server.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultReferenceCollection" /> object that contains search references returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResultReferenceCollection" /> che contiene i riferimenti di ricerca restituiti dal server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.Referral" /> property contains the server referrals.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.Referral" /> contiene i riferimenti del server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.ResultCode" /> property contains a value of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> that specifies the result code for the operation.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchResponse.ResultCode" /> contiene un valore di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> che specifica il codice di risultato per l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The result code for the operation.
